3: The abandoned dock the liaison mentioned is up ahead.
I can't help but feel like we're walking into a trap. Regardless of our first encounter or during dinner last night, he had a strange look about him whenever this place is mentioned.
I'm sure we'll know when we get there. So, let's keep moving.
...The leader of the ARU and members of Babylonia, eh?
Bring Sergey here. He'll recognize me.
If you move an inch, we've got bullets with your names on it.
The man glares at you before turning to operate the radio station.
...Got it. If you think it's okay, then no problem.
The man puts down the receiver and turns to face you and the others.
You may pass, Mr. Staessen. Mr. Antonov says hello to you.
He's in the ruins of the office building up ahead. Sergey is also waiting for you... all.
Someone I know... But he's on the same as Sergey now?
